posts.author: Johnny Evans
posts.title: Hyndman Hope
posts.content: Hyndman is doing so well with the Rangers right now. He is starting and scoring tons of goals. He is making waves and building great transfer rumors

posts.author: Henry Boes
posts.title: Pulisic Time
posts.content: Pulisic is doing so well with the Rangers right now. He is starting and scoring tons of goals. He is making waves and building great transfer rumors
